thread.title: Win tickets to London Fashion Week event with Peter Pilotto
thread.title_full: Win tickets to London Fashion Week event with Peter Pilotto - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win tickets to London Fashion Week event with Peter Pilotto
text: The London Fashion Week (LFW) Talk Series, presented by American Express, will provide attendees with insight from renowned industry insiders and experts. The five talks will take place during LFW (September 18-22, 2015) at London's Conde Nast College and are open to the public. Tickets for the series will be released on September 15, 2015. The Telegraph is offering 30 tickets to ‘From Foundation to Fashion Week with Peter Pilotto' on Tuesday, September 22, 2015 from 2–2.45pm. Join Peter Pilotto and business partner Christopher de Vos , as they share their story and provide advice for people interested in a career in fashion design with Vanity Fair’s Elizabeth Saltzman . @telegraph
